description: {"blocks":[{"key":"e5mhc","text":"Utilizing a CRISPR RNP complex and nucleofection, this protocol enables precise gene knockout. LUHMES cells, sourced from human fetal mesencephalic tissue, provide a valuable model for investigating dopaminergic dysfunction. They exhibit stimulus-induced dopamine release, pertinent electrophysiological traits, and distinctive dopaminergic markers, validating their phenotypic relevance.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1atrp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5fkqe","text":"LUHMES Cell Line: (ATCC Catalog Number: CRL-2927)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"al0o7","text":"Nucleofection kit:  P3 Primary Cell 4D-Nucleofector X Kit S Catalog #V4XP-3032","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"frid3","text":"Maintain cell confluency between 70–85% to optimize Nucleofection efficiencies; optimal results typically occur with cells in the logarithmic growth phase.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2chci","text":"Coat a new 6-well plate freshly with poly-L-ornithine (50ug/mL) and fibronectin (2ug/mL) to facilitate LUHMES attachment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4t07n","text":"Rinse LUHMES with    1XPBS, then add   to dissociate the cells, using  for a T-75 flask, and incubate for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":37,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":69,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":106,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"49e5t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"05D398338E1F4271870B4CB8D81764F6","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"trypsin-EDTA (TE)","rrid":"","sku":"R001100","url":"http://","vendor":{"id":31,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.fishersci.com/us/en/home.html","name":"Fisher Scientific"}}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"11a8j","text":"Centrifuge  for  , then carefully discard the supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":16,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f99ml","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1200","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"avtkp","text":"Re-suspend cells with  of 1X PBS and count cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7hqar","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"14qi5","text":"Add cells to the cuvette, ensuring the sample covers the bottom of the cuvette. Gently tap to distribute evenly and avoid bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cemhk","text":"Following nucleofection, immediately add an additional  of pre-warmed media to each individual single cuvette or 50 uL to a curvette strip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9adce","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cn5q","text":"Maintain cell stability by avoiding any disturbance for at least  at room temperature  or within an incubator","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":64,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":86,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fgp8r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d33rl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"2","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a0qoa","text":"Insert the nucleocuvettes into the nucleofector cuvette slot, ensuring they are properly aligned, then press start.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"36bg1","text":"Add   of the LUHMES growth media to the 6-well plate and pre-incubate/equilibrate the plates in a humidified incubator set at 37°C with 5% CO2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8apd5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
